comments:
I tried to define simple workflow.
I added a job and few input output ports. But when I try to click and drag any in/out port a lot of unhandled event loop exception is thrown:

Ye, I will look into this. It would be useful to know what exactly you were trying to do with the input and output ports.
I am just trying tu click and drag input port over the screen
Work on this and other aspects of the workflow editor is ongoing.
